hero_description: Zinnias, sunflowers, celosia, and more — cultivated with care in the heart of Ohio. Fresh-cut from our field to your hands, July through first frost.
season_banner: 2026 Summer CSA — Now accepting signups · Limited spots available
market_note: We'll be at a local farmers market this summer — details coming soon! Follow us on social media to be the first to know where and when you can find us.
about_paragraph_1: Beyond Measure Flowers is a small cut flower farm in Ohio, heading into our third growing season. What started as a love for growing beautiful things has turned into a passion for sharing them with our community.
about_paragraph_2: We focus on a curated selection of varieties — zinnias, sunflowers, celosia, gomphrena, and a few surprises — grown with care and harvested at their peak. Every stem we sell is something we grew ourselves, and we think that makes all the difference.
about_paragraph_3: We're still growing and learning every season, and we love bringing people along for the ride.
weddings_description: We take on a limited number of weddings and events each season, giving every celebration our full attention. Our farm-grown flowers bring a natural, seasonal beauty that can't be replicated.
